title: Create a new deployment for ESM (Helm)
content:
The cdfctl OMT tool is required to create a new deployment with helm charts. This tool uses a namespace, default certificate, and service account to install an application.

Use the following steps to create a new deployment for the suite. 

  1. Log on to one of the control plane nodes or the bastion node as the root user or the regular user with elevated permissions.
  2. Run the following command to create a deployment: 
    $CDF_HOME/bin/cdfctl deployment create -d <Deployment_Name>
    In this command, <Deployment_Name> is a placeholder for the name that you wish to refer to your deployment.
  3. You will get the newly created suite with the name you specified earlier. You can use the following command to confirm: 
    kubectl get ns
